# extract-llms-docs

> Extract documentation for AI agents from any site with llms.txt support. Features MCP server, REST API, batch processing, and multiple export formats.

## Links

- Repository: https://github.com/nirholas/extract-llms-docs
- Author: https://github.com/nirholas
- Full documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nirholas/extract-llms-docs/main/llms-full.txt
